message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for it, which is closer to the middle, but still within my budget.
